title: Kyparissia
description: An ancient settlement of Laconia in the Peloponnese, identified by modern scholars with the modern Boza plateau and the west-facing bay below it (northwest of ancient Asopos). The area has produced archaeological evidence dating from the bronze age to late Roman.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 4268
